member.name: T:Domain.Facade
member.summary: This class is the main interface of the TestViewer

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchAdministrator(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns an administrator by Id.
member.exception: When Administrator is not found

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.CandidatesThatContains(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a collection of all the candidates that starts with the specified number.
member.param: Student number part that is contained in the whole student number

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchCandidates(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Fetches a collection of active or inactive candidates

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchCandidate(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the student with a matching Student number
member.exception: If no record found.

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchCandidate(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves the student using the Candidate ID
member.exception: When Candidate is not found

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.CreateCandidate(System.String)
member.summary: Creates candidate information. Returns the candidate record if student number already exists.
member.exception: When student number is not valid

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.UpdateCandidate(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the candidate student number and status
member.exception: When Candidate cannot be updated due to some reason
When the Candidate that is going to be updated is not found
When New Student Number is already being used by some Candidates

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.UpdateCandidate(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the candidate student number. Returns a BusinessRuleException if newStudentNumber exists.
member.exception: When Candidate cannot be updated because it is already in the Candidate Test or New Student number is already being used by other candidate
When the Candidate that is going to be updated is not found

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.ChangeCandidateStatus(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid})
member.summary: Change Candidate's status into its opposite status
member.exception: When Candidate ID is not found
When Candidate cannot be updated due to some reason

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.DeleteCandidate(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes the Candidate associated with the Candidate ID
member.exception: When Candidate is not found
When Candidate cannot be deleted due to some reason

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchQuestion(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the question associated with the questionId
member.exception: When Question is not found

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchQuestionThatContains(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of Questions that contains the provided text in the question text.
member.param: Word or Part contained in the Question text

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchQuestionsNotInTheTestTemplate(System.Guid)
member.summary: Fetches a collection of questions that are not associated with the Test Template
member.exception: When Test template is not found

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.CreateQuestion(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a new question to the Question Bank. Returns the question if Question text already exists in the Question Bank
member.exception: When Question is empty or white space.

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.UpdateQuestion(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the question to the Question Bank
member.exception: When Question is not found
When Question has been used in the Test Template or Test Instance

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.UpdateQuestionStatus(System.Guid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates Question status to its opposite status.
member.exception: When Question is not found
When setting the question to inactive while it is being used in the Test Template

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.DeleteQuestion(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes the question from the Question Bank and all its choices.
member.exception: When question is not found
When Question is unable to be deleted because it is being used in the test template or the test instance

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.CreateQuestionChoice(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a new question choice
member.param: Is the choice the correct answer
member.exception: When Choice text is empty or white space

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.UpdateQuestionChoice(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates a question choice
member.exception: When either question or choice is not found
When Question is being used in either the Test Template or Test Instance

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.DeleteQuestionChoice(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Removes a question choice
member.exception: When either Question or Choice is not found
When Question is being used in either the Test Template or Test Instance

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.DeleteAllChoices(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes all choices associated with the particular question
member.exception: When either Question or Choice is not found.

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchTestTemplate(System.Guid)
member.summary: Fetch's a specific test template according to its Guid Template ID
member.exception: When Test Template is not found

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchTestTemplateThatContains(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches all Test Templates that contains a specified text in the test template name
member.param: Part of the Test Template name

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.CreateTestTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Test Template
member.exception: When Test Template name is empty or white space or exists

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.UpdateTestTemplate(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Updates Test Template name
member.exception: When Test template is not found
When Test Template is being used in a Test Instance

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.DeleteTestTemplate(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes Test Template, throws exception if its assocciated with a test instance or has questions.

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.AddOrRemoveTemplateQuestion(System.Guid,System.Guid,Domain.AddOrRemoveStatus)
member.summary: adds or removes question into the test template

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchTestInstances(System.Guid)
member.summary: Fetches all test instances asssociated with the administrator ID provided.

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchTestInstance(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Fecthes a particular Test Instance associated with the administrator ID
member.exception: When Administrator or Test Instance is not found

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.CreateTestInstance(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid},System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Test Instance
member.param: List of Candidate IDs that will be added into the Test Instance
member.exception: When Test Template or one of the Candidates is not found.
When the Candidate status is not active

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.UpdateTestInstance(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the Test Instance information
member.exception: When Test Template or Administrator or Test Instance is not found
When unable to update once Test Instance is Open.

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.DeleteTestInstance(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes the Test Instance
member.exception: When Administrator or Test Instance is not found
When unable to delete once Test Instance is Open

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.OpenTestInstance(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Opens the Test Instance and make it accessible to the candidates
member.exception: When Administrator or Test Instance is not found
When Test Instance cannot be opened due to Business Rule Violation

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.CloseTestInstance(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Closes the Test Instance and make it inaccessible to the candidates
member.exception: When Administrator or Test Instance is not found
When Test Instance cannot be closed due to Business Rule Violation

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.FetchCandidateTest(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Fetches a particular candidate test.
member.exception: When Test Template or Test Instance or Candidate Test is not found

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.AddCandidateToTestInstance(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Add a candidate to the Test Instance
member.exception: When Test Template or Test Instance or Candidate is not found
When the Candidate already exists in the Test Instance or status is not active

member.name: M:Domain.Facade.RemoveCandidateFromTestInstance(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Removes a particular candidate from the test instance
member.exception: When Test Template or Test Instance or Candidate Test is not found
When cannot remove Candidate Test because the Test Instance is already open
